vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Jashub (H3437H) and Shimron (H8110B); also called Puvah (KJV: Phuvah) at Gen.46.13; 1xPunite at Num.26.23;
Group of pu.ah (פּוּאָה "Puah" H6312)
§ Punites = see Puah "scattered"
descendants of Puah, the son of Issachar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Puvá, hijo de Isacar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
普瓦族 这个種族名稱 形容詞在原文的意思是 見 普瓦 "散佈的"
以撒迦的兒子普瓦的後裔(民 26:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
普瓦族 这个种族名称 形容词在原文的意思是 见 普瓦 "散布的"
以撒迦的儿子普瓦的后裔(民 26:23)
